attributes.action: Create A Youth Theatre In Bishops Cleeve, Cheltenham, Gloucestershire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Bishops Cleeve Is The Largest Village In Europe, We are Petitioning for a Youth Organisation which can aid youths in the village to achieve more and maximise their potential. We already have a youth centre, but this doesn't offer potential for teenagers, just a "hang out". Please Help!
